title: Sensitive Soul - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/18/21
itunes:title: Sensitive Soul - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/18/21
description:
George Noory and author Michael Jawer explore his research into emotional sensitivity, how people use their senses to become more attuned to their surroundings, and how events like deja vu and PTSD are connected to our emotions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A discussion on the emotional connection humans have to the world around them.
